title: Establish Routine
description: Create consistent daily schedules for better child development and family harmony.

title: Active Listening
description: Spend quality time listening to your children without distractions or judgment.

title: Positive Reinforcement
description: Encourage good behavior by praising and recognizing your child's efforts.

title: Set Boundaries
description: Communicate clear, age-appropriate rules and consequences consistently.

title: Emotional Intelligence
description: Help children understand and manage their emotions effectively.

title: Quality Time
description: Dedicate uninterrupted time to connect and engage with your children.

title: Lead by Example
description: Demonstrate the values and behaviors you want your children to adopt.

title: Encourage Independence
description: Allow children to make age-appropriate decisions and learn from mistakes.
